ygData.subject: Re: Addition to petition
ygData.msgSnippet: Those spell look alikes made me mad, also another that made me mad back in the lower levels is why does the Fine Steel Staff look like wood?!?! ~~Farwen
ygData.messageBody:
Those spell look alikes made me mad, also another that made me mad back in
the lower levels is why does the Fine Steel Staff look like wood?!?!

~~Farwen "Mightyraven" Ohtarin~~

Eric Jesperson wrote:

> From: "Eric Jesperson" <ejesperson@...>
>
> > From: Sergey Bukhman <sergeyb@...>
> >
> >
> > Have you noticed how all the spell casters have been visually screwed?
> <snip>
> > Qenelin
>
> And whats up with our spell effects all looking the same? Someone
> please
> explain to me why Lightning Bolt looks suspiciously like Fire Bolt? And
> Shock
> of Lightning being red? Even if the effects become more varied at higher
> levels
> there still is no excuse.
>
> Trystesa the complainer )
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Where do some of the Internet's largest email lists reside?
> http://www.onelist.com
> At ONElist - the most scalable and reliable service on the Internet.
